title: High Elf Lineage
entryLore: Heirs to elves infused with the magic of the Feywild, high elves are naturally adept at arcane arts. This lineage allows them to weave magic as easily as others breathe, often specializing in utility and mobility spells that reflect their otherworldly heritage.

traits.name: Wizard Cantrip
traits.description: You know one Wizard cantrip of your choice (standard: [[prestidigitation|Prestidigitation]]). Whenever you finish a [[long_rest|Long Rest]], you can replace that cantrip with a different cantrip from the Wizard spell list.

traits.name: High Elf Magic
traits.description: You can cast [[detect_magic|Detect Magic]] (level 3) and [[misty_step|Misty Step]] (level 5) once each per Long Rest without components.
